name: Lost Identities
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

An exciting mystery thriller guaranteed to keep you in suspense!
Teenagers are disappearing without a trace, only to reappear with new personailities. FBI agents Derek and Alice begin with their investigation and are soon caught up between the government, FBI, and pharmaceuticals giant BioPharmaka. Time is running out...
  • Investigate atmospheric locations
  • Question witnesses, suspects, and victims
  • Features numerous puzzles and minigames: Hack into computers, break open doors, decrypt files...
publishedBy: dtp young entertainment GmbH & Co. KG
